(I'm not sure if I got this right. My power went off yersterday, so I 
couldn't get on-line. So, I got the info from the Events section. (Thank you 
KDog, but please take that music off, and is there a way you can make links 
to the days instead of scrolling all the way down?) Dang Manhole!)





Quickstrike:









Quickstrike saw the blast coming from Sinester, threw himself to the ground, 
as well as loosing his balance. The firepower breezed right past his leg, 
just as he fell to the ground. The brace on his leg snapped, breaking in 
two.

He screamed in anger and pulled his cobra arm from out underneath his body. 
He took a swift aim and fired at Sinester's leg.
